When the heart is cleansed from sin, Christ is placed on the throne that self-indulgence and love of earthly treasure once occupied. The image of Christ is seen 
                                                                           28
in the expression of the countenance. The work of sanctification is carried forward in the soul.  Self-righteousness is banished. There is seen the putting on of the new man, which after Christ is created in righteousness and true holiness.--R. & H., Sept. 11, 1900.
